definitions.definition: a way of emphasizing that something is true and that there is no doubt about it

examples.text: I definitely remember sending the letter.
‘Would you like to go back there?’ ‘**Definitely not!**'
She most definitely did not want my help.
If you want to know more I'd definitely recommend checking out this guide .

definitions.definition: in a way that is certain or that shows that you are certain

examples.text: The date of the move has not been definitely decided yet *(= it may change)*.
Please say definitely whether you will be coming or not.
